pages.text: $(li)The poor $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/ghast)Ghasts$(/l) that live in the nether are imprisoned in the Soul Prison that can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)Be careful with the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/wither_skeleton)Wither Skeletons$(/l) guarding this place, unless do you want to end up like these creatures.
